title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Workshop on Lifelong Learning Measurement Tool Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Develop an 18-item self-assessment tool to measure lifelong learning competencies
Validate the tool’s construct validity using factor analysis techniques (exploratory factor analysis, principal component analysis)
Diagnose learners’ individual lifelong learning styles and strengths/weaknesses across four sub-elements (goal setting, resource utilization, self-reflection, practical application)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
